com.cmput301.cs.project.serialization

Class RemoteSaver<T extends Saveable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.cs.project.serialization.RemoteSaver<T>

  • public class RemoteSaver<T extends Saveable>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows any class implementing Saveable to be saved and retrived from an elastic search server. The given Type must be a SearchResponse due to Java restrictions. Example Usage: Type type = new TypeToken>() {}.getType(); mRemoteClaimSaves = new RemoteSaver("claims", type); claims = mRemoteClaimSaves.loadAll(); mRemoteClaimSaves.saveAll(); saveAll() is fire and forget. It uses a separate thread and if it fails it does so silently. loadAll() will block and wait until the action is complete.

      Constructs a RemoteSaver for saving to an elastic search index
